metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37601 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: muc.lib.lua in Prosody 0.11.0 through 0.11.9 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information (list of admins, members, owners, and banned entities of a Multi-User chat room) in some common configurations.

criterions.comment: prosody: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
